high_descs: turn around and walk to the corner at the end of the room
grab the box off of the floor there
turn right and walk to the desk to the left of the bed at the end of the room
anns.task_desc: turn on a lamp while holding a box

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the corner of the room on the right.
Pick up the cardboard box to the right of the bear on the floor.
Turn right and walk to the small nightstand next to the bed with the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine a box by the light of a small lamp.

high_descs: Turn around and go to the left corner.
Pick up the cardboard box, on the floor, in the corner.
Turn around and go straight to the night stand on the left side of the bed.
Turn on the lamp in the back, right corner of the night stand.
